nodes.text: Loreeves was a female Human who worked as a stimulants vendor on the planet Corellia. During the Great Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic she ran a stall within the Republic controlled Shipwright Auxiliary Spaceport. Loreeves had brown hair, blue eyes and fair skin. While at her stall she wore grey clothing.

Loreeves first appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic which was released in 2011 by BioWare. In the game she serves as a Republic stims vendor on Corellia. Her location was also marked on a map in the Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide; however, the guide provides her name as "Lora Preevus."
